title: Sudum Nilavu Lyrics Thambi
stanzas:
<div>
Sudum Nilavu Lyrics Thambi

Sudum nilavu
sudaatha suriyan
oadum nimisham
uyraiyum varusham

ellaam ellaam
ellaam vendumaa(2)

kathalithu paar
kathalithu paar (2)

imai adithaalum
idhayam valikkum
valigalil kooda
vaasanai iraikkum

kathalithu paar
kathalithu paar (2)

narambukku naduve
nadhigal nagarum
nadhi irundhaadum
naave ularum

thappu ellaam
kdithamaagum
thavaru ellaam
punithamaagum

pachchai thanneer
vetpam aagum
echchil pandam
amirtham aagum.

naakku uthadu
pesum vaarthai
muththam aagum.

Sudum nilavu
sudaatha suriyan
oadum nimisham
uyraiyum varusham

mazhaithuli namakku
samuthiram aagum
samuthiram ellaam
thuliyaai pogum.

kathalithu paar
kathalithu paar
kathalithu paar
kathalithu paar

sathiya kaadhal
ennam seiyyum
chandhira oliyai
aadaiyaai neiyum

thottaa baagam
motchamaagum
maththa baagam
kaaichal aagum

deivam theindhu
mirugam aagum
mirugam thoongi
deivamaagum

thaedal ondre
vazhkai endru
therindhu pogum.

Sudum nilavu
sudaatha suriyan
oadum nimisham
uyraiyum varusham

ellaam ellaam
ellaam vendumaa

kathalithu paar
kathalithu paar (2)
Posted at www.tsonglyrics.net
